synopsis: Set in the American South during the 1930s, this novel follows young Scout Finch as her father, lawyer Atticus Finch, defends a Black man falsely accused of rape.
In a totalitarian future society, Winston Smith works for the government rewriting history but secretly dreams of rebellion.
A portrait of the Jazz Age through the story of the fabulously wealthy Jay Gatsby and his love for the beautiful Daisy Buchanan.
The spirited Elizabeth Bennet deals with issues of manners, morality, and marriage in the society of the landed gentry.
Bilbo Baggins, a respectable hobbit, is swept into an epic quest to reclaim a dwarf kingdom from the dragon Smaug.
